content:
As an AI language model, I can't predict Apple's plans for the future. However, Apple has historically been known for its ability to innovate and stay ahead of the curve in terms of consumer needs and trends. It's likely that Apple will continue to adapt to changes in the market and consumer demand, including the ongoing impact of the pandemic. 

Apple has already shifted its focus to products that are useful during the pandemic, such as expanding its health features in the Apple Watch and developing a COVID-19 screening app in partnership with the CDC. It's possible that the company will continue to prioritize products that can help people stay connected and productive in a pandemic environment, while also continuing to invest in new technologies and innovations, as it always has.
